title: Domestic travel spending in France 2012 to 2028
summary: Overall Spending in billion euros has increased over the Year.
Spending in billion euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, and finally slightly increasing from 2018 to 2028.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2028.
Maximum Spending in billion euros, about 131.4 was reported at Year 2028
The lowest Spending in billion euros, of value 108.1 was reported at Year 2015
min_summary: In general Spending in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Spending in billion euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, and finally slightly increasing from 2018 to 2028.
